title: SEMANA CARDANO
description: I am trying to dissolve the English Language barrier making Cardano fully accessible to the second most natively spoken language: Spanish.
solution: I'm going to create and deliver a content-machine that will expose Cardano in Spanish putting it at the center of the Blockchain Revolution.
experience: I'm an Awarded TV series writer and producer, a good marketer, the founder of Spanishpedia, a serial content creator and a lover of Cardano.
